channel.title: Is this possible
channel.description: idk if its in right spot. its kinda part of two boards. anyway i was looking through the models board and poeple have like modeled m7s for mopar. ther eis camo costume too. my question is would it be possible to like use that karil crossbow emote etc and change it into a gun? also would it be possible to make dif army costumes like digital or desert medic helmet etc. and my last and most questioning one would it be possible to change npcs to army guys too and amke it an army game.

item.title: Is this possible
item.dc:creator: @Mr_Despair Mr. Despair
item.description:
@Mr_Despair wrote:

Get the emote for shooting a gun or w.e you want it to look like and change the karil emote to the new one in client.

Read full topic

item.title: Is this possible
item.dc:creator: @hippo429 hippo429
item.description:
@hippo429 wrote:

Now do you have “ANY?” idea how the &*$? im going to do that? lol anyone know how?

item.title: Is this possible
item.dc:creator: @xxpkpurexx xxpkpurexx
item.description:
@xxpkpurexx wrote:

everything you said is possible “BUT”"“But” you have to know what you are doing you can always recolor the camo armour you get from random events and somehow dress it onto a npc or you can recolor it so your players can wear it and the karils xbow not sure if you can change that one into a gun but you can make a gun

Read full topic
